cast.name: 朱利亚·迪·奎里欧 Giulia Di Quilio

introduction: That story is about Franco Califanos " third life " from his decline to the revival, until death: life experiences, moments of tragedy and suering always exceeded lightly and with stubbornness by the songwriter. The Maestro is walking on the beach: he walks away from his closest friends to go dying away from them, alone. In this leaving journey, he recalls the hardest and the most beautiful moments of his life, made up by situations of fun side by side with circumstances of loneliness and bitterness. We nd out the relationship with himself, with his friends, with showbuisness and journalists. He recalls his relationship with young people too, and the boost they give him to return writing and re-emerge from the abyss into which he had conned. It was during this reection that Franco shows through phrases, thoughts and experiences the less-known side of his mind: a long journey that makes us know an unpublished Franco Califano, nuances that only few friends knew. A journey to prove ...
